title: Furil (group)
text:
Furil (フリルズ) was a Japanese trio group consisting of three main seiyus from the anime Wedding Peach namely Kyōko Hikami,  Yūko Miyamura, Yukana and later Yuka Imai.


== Members ==


=== 1995 ===
Kyōko Hikami
Yūko Miyamura
Yukana


=== 1996 ===
Yuka Imai


== Discography ==


=== Singles ===
Dreaming Love Angel (夢見る愛天使)
Juliet of the 21st Century (21世紀のジュリエット)
Merry Angel (メリーエンジェル)
Sweet Little Love (甘い小さな愛)
Jewels from Summer (夏がくれた宝石)
Monochrome (モノクローム)
